reviewText: This is a mesmerizing film about Marsden Hartley and you will see his artwork up close like never before.  A brilliantly executed poetic journey.

Beautiful film.  Moving, true to text, and wonderfully cast.  I highly recommend this film to all Marsden Hartley admirers.. or for that matter to anyone who wishes to see a moving, beautifully narrated film.

There is far too little about Marsden Hartley out there. I came across this marvellous DVD  by Michael Maglaras two years ago. It's a labour of love. We've watched it several times. Highly recommended.
